content.title: Dr. Ragavi V
content.caption: President
content.content: Dr. Ragavi V is a visionary academician with over two decades of experience in higher education. She holds a Ph.D. in Computer Science, an M.Phil., an MCA, and a B.Sc. in Physics, reflecting her strong interdisciplinary foundation spanning science, technology, and holistic education.Dr. Ragavi, as a transformational leader, pioneered initiatives such as 24×7 student helplines, open forums, inclusive student clubs, and leadership development programs—promoting a student-centered environment that fosters empowerment, experiential learning, and emotional well-being.Her research interests include Artificial Intelligence, Healthcare Technologies, Smart Systems, and Educational Innovation. With over 15 years of active research contribution, she has published extensively in Scopus and Web of Science-indexed journals, filed multiple patents, and secured more than ₹1.26 crores in competitive research grants from DST and other national agencies.Her academic ethos is rooted in innovation, inclusivity, and student empowerment. Through her leadership and compassionate mentorship, she continues to shape the next generation of scholars and professionals, making a lasting impact on higher education.

content.title: Dean - Engineering
content.caption: President
content.content: Dr. A. Amudha is the Dean (i/c), Faculty of Engineering, Karpagam Academy of Higher Education, Coimbatore, India. A passionate researcher and an academician, she has more than 3 Decades of teaching experience. She holds her doctorate degree under faculty of Electrical and Electronics Engineering, Anna University Chennai, Masters in Power Systems Engineering from Thiyagarajar College of Engineering, Madurai and Bachelors Degree in Electrical and Electronics Engineering from Government College of Technology, Coimbatore.She has held various administrative positions and was Instrumental in bringing Outcome Based Education. She has been a reviewer for IEEE, IET, Elsevier Journals and contributed to more than 125 papers in Scopus and SCI indexed Journals and Conference proceedings. She has received grants from funding agencies like DRDO, and MNRE. She is a vibrant member of professional societies like IEEE, ISTE, IEI, IAMP etc. She is a dynamic speaker and delivered more than 40 lectures in International, National level conferences, workshop, and seminars. She has produced 8 PhD scholars and guiding 5 Ph.D. scholars.

content.title: Ar. P. Kathiravan
content.caption: President
content.content: Ar.P.Kathiravan is  the Dean (i/c) of Architecture, Designing and Planning, Karpagam Academy of Higher Education. He hails from Coimbatore and has a career span of fifteen years in practice and academia. He received his bachelor of Architecture (B.Arch) degree from Thiagarajar College of Engineering, Kamarajar University, Madurai in 2002, Master in Construction Engineering Management (CEM) degree from Manipal Institute of Technology, Manipal in 2004 and currently doing Ph.D in Green Buildings from National Institute of Technology, Calicut.He started his Architectural practice with Venkataramanan Associates, Bangalore as a Designer manager. He worked on the projects including the Biocon Pharma Research and Manufacturing campus in Bangalore and many prestigious projects for companies like Purvankara, Prestige, Akshaya, premier & pricol etc., from Bangalore, Chennai and Coimbatore. Later he set up his own firm SK Associates and since then the practice has successfully bloomed into a house of integrated and comprehensive design services.He started his academic career with Architecture, Karpagam Academy of Higher Education as an Associate Professor (visiting); he also served as Professor (visiting) in RVS School of Architecture and SRM Ramapuram School of Architecture, Chennai. Later he has been elevated as Dean (i/c), Architecture, Designing and Planning, Karpagam Academy of Higher Education, Coimbatore.Architecture has to do with planning, designing and constructing form, space and ambiance to reflect functional, technical, social, environmental and aesthetic considerations.“If you are looking for a college that prepares you for success in the future, Architecture, Karpagam Academy of Higher Education just does that” – by putting innovation and interdisciplinary collaboration at the center of the curriculum. In Architecture, last year graduates got 100% placement. What is the secret? Giving students the opportunity to learn in live setting that balances theory and practice by working on real-world projects in active, collaborative, and environment oriented. Students will experience a student-centered approach to a professional education, be taught by highly accomplished faculty, and have many opportunities to engage with the professional community and industry partners.

content.title: Prof. Dr. D. KUMUDHA
content.caption: President
content.content: Prof. Dr. D. Kumudha, has been in teaching and research in the field of pharmaceutical chemistry for more than a decade. She has completed B.Pharm., degree from Sri Ramakrishna Institute of Paramedical Sciences, Coimbatore, M.Pharm., degree in Pharmaceutical Chemistry from K. M. College of Pharmacy, Madurai and did Ph.D., in Pharmaceutical Sciences from Jawarharlal Nehru Technological University, Hyderabad. She served as a Professor and Head, Department of Pharmaceutical chemistry, Adithya BIPER, Bangalore. She joined as Professor in Faculty of Pharmacy, Karpagam Academy of Higher Education in 2019.Her research interest is in the field of Drug Design, Phytochemistry, Synthetic Chemistry, Pharmacological Screening, Cancer Research and Nanoformulations. She has 13 publications in National & International journals and presented her work in State & National conferences
